description: To create a default view (which creates the SNO file), select Options → Save Current Options As Default and click Save in the prompt. This action will create a SNO file in the Prefs\​[application version] location.
To create a preset (which creates the SNO file), select Options → Save Preset... , name the file, choose the save location (the default location is in Sky Data\​View Options folder), and click Save .
You can also choose a default preset view, which are SNO files that are located in the Sky Data\​View Options folder. To choose one of these views, select Options → Presets → [your desired view] .
